reviewText: A nonsensical trivia game where the answers are sometimes wrong, the questions are sometimes vague, and the gameplay in-between the trivia is tedious and insane. Also everything is a stereotype. Could be fun if you're willing to laugh at it, as its madness is the only thing it brings to the table.\n\nWant to see more? Check out the Pudge Preview I recorded of this game! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3e0LiRXw6wo
